{
  "name": "alan-agent-suggestions",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Agent suggestions UI with real-time updates via WebSocket",
  "private": true,
  "workspaces": [
    "client",
    "server"
  ],
  "engines": {
    "node": "18.20.3",
    "yarn": "3.7.1"
  },
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-server start",
    "dev:server": "cross-env PORT=3003 yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-server dev",
    "dev:client": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-client start",
    "dev": "concurrently \"yarn dev:server\" \"yarn dev:client\"",
    "build": "yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-client build",
    "test": "yarn workspaces foreach run test",
    "test:server": "yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-server test",
    "test:client": "yarn workspace alan-agent-suggestions-client test",
    "test:all": "yarn test",
    "test:coverage": "yarn workspaces foreach run test --coverage",
    "constraints": "yarn constraints",
    "constraints:fix": "yarn constraints --fix",
    "lint": "eslint \"src/**/*.{js,jsx}\" \"client/src/**/*.{js,jsx}\" \"server/**/*.{js,jsx}\" --max-warnings 0",
    "lint:fix": "eslint \"src/**/*.{js,jsx}\" \"client/src/**/*.{js,jsx}\" \"server/**/*.{js,jsx}\" --fix",
    "precommit": "yarn lint"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "ajv": "^8.12.0",

[read_file for 'scripts/bootstrap.ps1'] Result:

# scripts\bootstrap.ps1
Set-StrictMode -Version Latest
$repo = Split-Path -Parent (Split-Path -Parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition)

# 1) Node & Yarn via Volta
if (-not (Get-Command volta -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
  Write-Host "Installing Volta for Node & Yarn version management..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  iwr https://get.volta.sh -useb | Invoke-Expression
}
Write-Host "Setting up Node 18.20.3 and Yarn 3.7.1 via Volta..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
volta install node@18.20.3 yarn@3.7.1   # pins binaries in %USERPROFILE%\.volta

# 2) Python 3.11
if (-not (Get-Command pyenv -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) {
  Write-Host "pyenv not found. Please install pyenv-win first:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  Write-Host "https://github.com/pyenv-win/pyenv-win#installation" -ForegroundColor Yellow
  Write-Host "Then run this script again." -ForegroundColor Yellow
  exit 1
}

Write-Host "Setting up Python 3.11.9 via pyenv..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
if (-not (pyenv versions | Select-String '3.11.9')) {
  pyenv install 3.11.9
}
pyenv local 3.11.9
python -m pip install --upgrade pip virtualenv
python -m virtualenv .venv
& .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1

if (Test-Path "$repo\alan_core") {
  Write-Host "Installing alan_core package..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
  pip install -e "$repo\alan_core\"
}

# 3) JavaScript deps (zero-install is basically a checksum)
Write-Host "Installing JavaScript dependencies..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
yarn install --immutable --immutable-cache

Write-Host "`nâœ… Environment ready. Run 'yarn dev' to launch the ALAN IDE." -ForegroundColor Green
